text: I have taken 3 orders which the time are so closed
Hi what happened if we had a no show
No way for you to amend orders. U can only ask Cs to cancel. Then you will get a warning unless you have legitimate reason for cancelling. Next time check first before swiping the order.

Refer to my earlier post[NO-SHOW FOR ORDER]Dear Driver  you did not turn up to perform order XXXXXXXZZZZZ on 1/20/2022 10:41:02 PMPlease submit your appeal to https://form.As mentioned in the training  no-shows without a valid reason will lead to a permanent ban and the confiscation of the security deposit.Failure to submit any appeal within 48 hours  will result in immediate closure of account and confiscation of the security deposit.Any appeals are submitted will be reviewed for validity and will decide the outcome of it. Invalid appeals will resort in immediate closure of account and confiscation of the security deposit.Do take note that Lalamove takes No-Show cases very seriously. We seek your kind understanding in this matter.

The moral of the warning is to let everyone know that if u need to stack ur orders....try to stagger and have some buffer in between....
If u can't keep up with the orders in ur hand...likely will drag u down...just some friendly advice... like the wise CS says....u can STACK.....but when anything go awry.....u answer for it.
